record.title: AMENDING THE RULES OF THE HOUSE TO CLARIFY CERTAIN MATTERS RELATING TO OFFICIAL CONDUCT

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct be discharged from further consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 363) amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to clarify certain matters relating to official conduct, and ask for its immediate consideration in the House.

record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the resolution.
record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from Ohio?
record.narrative: The Clerk read the resolution, as follows:
